ingredients.content: 1 tsp fine sea salt, plus more for seasoning

preparations.content: Place water, salt and 1 tsp oil in mixing bowl then heat <b>10 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add pasta and cook <b>select time according to packet instructions/100°C//speed <b>. Drain pasta using Varoma dish, stir through 1 tsp olive oil and set aside.
Place parsley and red onions in mixing bowl then chop <b>2 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil, vinegar and chilli powder then mix <b>10 sec//speed 3<b>.
Place a serving bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in olives, tomatoes and capers.
Remove bowl from lid then add cooked pasta to serving bowl, pour dressing into bowl, then stir with spatula. Adjust seasoning to taste then serve warm or cold.
